name: Dice Survival
description:
Use dice to walk, get food and great equiment to Survive for 7 days to win.

In the daytime, the monsters are very mild and you can easily farm. But in the night, lots of Deadly monsters will appear and you will find it very hard to survive!

Instead of  heavy strategy, the game really requires luck to win.  Just throw your dice and see if you are the chosen one.
